title: Halfway To Work, Hair Etiquette, Back To Church, Too Much Lip Gloss and more.
itunes:title: Halfway To Work, Hair Etiquette, Back To Church, Too Much Lip Gloss and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Today's show is dedicated to all poultry workers. We are doing this for the chicken lover in you. Bitterman asks, "Have you ever ran out of the house and then realized fill in the blank?" No hair, long hair don't care! Fool #2 has the hair rules to abide by. Is embracing your emotions and accepting them really better for you in the long run or nah? The crew point out when you know it's time to go back to church. How do you know when you have too much lip gloss on? Do you know what word best describes the year 2020? Today in Closing Remarks, Steve gives us the analogy about reaping the harvest of your labor.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
